item.title: Falling fence slats, 24th June
item.description:
1 Pittville Crescent Lane dilapidated fencing Pieces falling into pavement with nails. Constant danger to people and animals as fence unstable Seems to happen several times a month then broken pieces losely nailed/ placed back again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pittville Crescent Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree within dense vegetation., 24th June
item.description:
To the right of the entrance to Little Priors, opposite 35, Station Road. Dense vegetation right up to roadside. Dead tree or possibly trees within it. Potential hazard to passing road users, pedestrians and houses opposite.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Station Road, Tewkesbury
